owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.message: The message passed from the Mailbox.dispatch() call
params.metadata: The metadata required for the hook

params.message: The message passed from the Mailbox.dispatch() call
params.metadata: The metadata required for the hook

returns._0: Quoted payment for the postDispatch call

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._hook: The address of the hook contract.

params._module: The address of the interchain security module contract.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

hookType().notice: Returns an enum that represents the type of hook

postDispatch(bytes,bytes).notice: Post action after a message is dispatched via the Mailbox

quoteDispatch(bytes,bytes).notice: Compute the payment required by the postDispatch call

setHook(address).notice: Sets the address of the application's custom hook.

setInterchainSecurityModule(address).notice: Sets the address of the application's custom interchain security module.

supportsMetadata(bytes).notice: Returns whether the hook supports metadata
